org.codepond.android.wizardroid

Class WizardActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • org.codepond.android.wizardroid.WizardActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public abstract class WizardActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
    Base class for activities that want to implement step-by-step wizard functionality. When using this class you must override onSetup(WizardFlow) to set up the wizard's flow and optionally onWizardDone() to handle wizard's finish event.

      • onSetup

        public void onSetup(WizardFlow flow)
        Set up the Wizard's flow. You must override this method and use WizardFlow.Builder to create the Wizard's flow.
        Parameters:
        flow - The wizard's flow which was created by calling WizardFlow.Builder.create().

        public void onWizardDone()
        Execute when wizard is complete.
